name: FrogHouse
description:
FrogHouse About

This is just a drag and drop game about the frog house!
Grab items and have fun!

  • Many items
  • 4 rooms
  • Funny sounds
Credits

Idea, art, modeling, sounds by Evgenia Cherkasova (premudraya)

Programming by Maxim Kuleshov (arisudesu)

"Bird Whistling" by InspectorJ
